overview: Who is afraid of Pink, Yellow and Green? Sinful XXX takes The Art of Porn up a notch with Colors of Sin, a celebration of hardcore porn, covered in color: Mimi seduces the butler in a world of yellow, Lady Gang gets a one-time visit in a pink jail and sex doll Angelica Heart's green box is unpacked by Lutro, whose fingers immediately find their way up her legs...
title: Colors of Sin
